headline: Reasons Why American Tower Corporation (AMT) is Strongly Favored by Hedge Funds
summary: American Tower Corporation (NYSE:AMT) is one of the most favored real estate investment trusts according to Hedge Funds. On January 14, Scotiabank analyst Maher Yaghi reaffirmed an Outperform rating for American Tower Corporation (NYSE:AMT). He lowered his price target forecast from $248 to $220, resulting in a revised upside of almost 20%. Yaghi’s rating is […]
